tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE research_library (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(100),
    publication_date DATE,
    abstract TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE publications (publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                     title STRING,
                     author STRING,
                     published_date DATE,
                     abstract STRING);

CREATE TABLE research_projects (project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                     project_name STRING,
                     researcher_name STRING,
                     start_date DATE,
                     end_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE project_publications (project_id INT,
                     publication_id INT,
                     FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES research_projects(project_id),
                     FOREIGN KEY (publication_id) REFERENCES publications(publication_id));

CREATE TABLE Publications (
    publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT,
    authors TEXT[],
    publication_date DATE,
    journal TEXT,
    abstract TEXT,
    keywords TEXT[],
    project_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Researchers (
    researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    affiliation TEXT,
    area_of_expertise TEXT[],
    projects INT[],
);

CREATE TABLE Projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_title TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    status TEXT,
    researchers INT[],
);

CREATE TABLE Keywords (
    keyword_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    keyword TEXT,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ProjectLiterature (
    project_id INT,
    publication_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (project_id, publication_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES ResearchProjects(project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (publication_id) REFERENCES Literature(publication_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ResearcherProjects (
    researcher_id INT,
    project_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (researcher_id, project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES ResearchProjects(project_id)
);
